Text: Can you bet mixed parlays with your sportsbookDear Sports Fan At Betquick we allow any sports combination in a parlay You can mix and match up to different sports teams in a parlay You can even parlay a Golf matchup with a football team or whatever team you desire We also offer the following Post several straight bets with one click of the confirm button Make an IfWin bet Example If my parlay or straight bet wins bet the following Reverse bets Round Robin or Box And much much more If thats not enough we will add to your deposit to try our fully licensed online sportsbook This offer is good until September Sincerely Roger Dunhill wwwBetQuickcom We strongly oppose the use of SPAM email and do not want anyone who does not wish to receive our mailings to receive them This is not SPAM If you do not wish to receive further mailings please reply to this email with remove in the subject matter
